title: # 505 - Anjelah Johnson & ME
itunes:title: # 505 - Anjelah Johnson & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Anjelah Johnson. We talk about her famous nail salon bit, culture & identity, dating a guy with a kid at 14, doing drugs at 12, gratitude, her rise to fame, and much more!

You can preorder Anjelah’s book “Who Do I Think I Am?: Stories of Chola Wishes and Caviar Dreams” on Amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/Who-Do-Think-Am-Stories/dp/1546000437 

 

Follow Anjelah 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/anjelahjohnson 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/anjelahjohnson 

 

This episode is brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Noom. Sign up for your trial today at http://www.noom.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is brought to you by Ladder. Go to http://www.ladderlife.com/bert to find out if you’re approved today!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Huel. Get free shipping, a shaker, and a t-shirt at http://www.huel.com/bert 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
